name: Zerodha Trade Assistant
description: An assistant that helps users authenticate with Zerodha and place trades via Kite Connect. Automatically handles login, token management, and order execution.

tools.name: buy_a_stock
tools.description: Buy shares of a stock. Parameters: stock (symbol), qty (number of shares)

tools.name: sell_a_stock
tools.description: Sell shares of a stock. Parameters: stock (symbol), qty (number of shares)

tools.name: show_portfolio
tools.description: Show current holdings and positions in the user's account.

tools.name: check_authentication_status
tools.description: Check if the user is currently authenticated with Zerodha.

tools.name: authenticate_now
tools.description: Start the login process automatically, triggering the browser and token exchange flow.

tools.name: confirm_reauthenticate
tools.description: Force re-authentication even if a token exists, after user confirms.

tools.name: force_reauthenticate
tools.description: Force re-authentication immediately without checking current token.
